body:
When prompted to select a card from your library or graveyard, the hand view will automatically switch to the appropriate view.

After selecting a card from your library or graveyard, the hand view doesn't re-appear automatically.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Hand, Library Graveyard switching

comments.body: Could you provide some specifics. I have tried using TestClone and TestSearch scenarios and in each case after selecting card it does switch back to the Hand.

comments.body: I made some additional changes in https://code.google.com/p/magarena/source/detail?r=34786219e25174facdee1050de190b687b19cfb5 and https://code.google.com/p/magarena/source/detail?r=5b51d3c38d6c841c072aec2124e80e4d1d4aaff1 to simplify the code.
